Voice-activated Karaoke Machine: Create a Bluetooth speaker that can connect to your phone and stream your favorite karaoke app. It can also have built-in microphones and speakers to provide a full karaoke experience.

Multi-room Audio System: Create a Bluetooth speaker that can connect to multiple other Bluetooth speakers in your home, allowing you to play different songs in each room or the same song throughout the entire house.
Portable Charger and Speaker: Create a Bluetooth speaker that also doubles as a portable phone charger. It can charge to two phones at once and can be charged via USB.
Smart Speaker with Ambient Lighting: Create a Bluetooth speaker that also has built-in ambient lighting. The lights can change colors based on the music being played or the time of day.
Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker: Create a Bluetooth speaker that is completely waterproof and can be used to 30 minutes in water. It can also have a built-in microphone for taking calls to water.
